name: ECAPS: Earth Conservation and Preservation Service
name_original: ECAPS: Earth Conservation and Preservation Service
description:
Welcome to ECAPS! You are a pilot assigned to the ECAPS program to attain desperately-needed elements from planets and bring them back to Earth. Once you've collected from every planet, head back to Earth to deposit your cargo. Watch out for asteroids and hostile aliens as you fly around the galaxy on your mission to save the world!

Entry for the 2018 Indie Galactic Space Jam.
